Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ḥm-ntr priest of Amun Ḥr with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face with traced features and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the leg section is inscribed with five rows of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
